product.title: Cellular Blackout Concrete Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
product.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

relproducts.title: Verona Prime 25mm Titanium Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A stylish grey tone, this titanium perfect fit venetian blind adds a bold grey shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.
